projects.name: API Recipe Library API
projects.description: A responsive recipe web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, using the Spoonacular API. Users can search by cuisine, diet, or keyword. Based on a Figma prototype, I customized the UI for mobile. Features include filtering, sorting, and a random recipe generator.

projects.name: Acecessibility App
projects.description: Built with semantic HTML, responsive CSS, and TypeScript with WCAG starards. this app features full keyboard navigation for inclusivity. Collaborated with a team on planning and implementation, focusing on clean, accessible code and intuitive UI/UX design.
